Skeleton.attack: Skeleton slammed you with a bone
Skeleton.deathmessage: The skeleton fell and became a hump of bones

Skeleton Boss.attack: Skeleton boss smashed you with multiple bones
Skeleton Boss.deathmessage: The skeleton boss fell and became a mountain of bones

Cave Dweller.attack: The cave dweller threw rocks at you
Cave Dweller.deathmessage: The cave dweller fell down and became part of the cave. Dead.
